metadata.description: Response templates for conversation flow, emails, and follow-ups

buyer.default: Hi {name}! üëã I'm here to help you find your perfect home. I'll ask a few quick questions (2-3 minutes) to understand what you're looking for. Ready to get started?
buyer.urgent: Hi {name}! üëã I see you're ready to buy soon. Great! Let me ask a few quick questions so I can connect you with the right homes immediately.
buyer.casual: Hey {name}! Thanks for reaching out. I'd love to help you in your home search. Mind if I ask a few questions to better understand what you're looking for?

seller.default: Hi {name}! üëã Thanks for considering selling your home. I'll ask a few quick questions (2-3 minutes) to understand your situation and goals. Sound good?
seller.urgent: Hi {name}! üëã I see you're ready to sell soon. Perfect! Let me ask a few questions so I can give you the most accurate information about selling your home.
seller.casual: Hey {name}! Thinking about selling? Great! Let me ask a few questions to see how I can best help you get top dollar for your property.

almost_done: Almost done! Just a couple more questions:
You're doing great! Two more quick ones:

hot_lead.buyer: Amazing! {name}, you sound like you're in a great position to buy. üéâ {agent_name} is going to LOVE working with you! Expect a call within 15 minutes to discuss properties that match what you're looking for. Talk soon!
hot_lead.seller: Fantastic! {name}, your home sounds like it'll do really well on the market. üéâ {agent_name} will call you within 15 minutes to discuss pricing strategy and next steps. Excited to help you sell!

warm_lead.buyer: Great! {name}, I have all the info I need. {agent_name} will reach out within 2 hours to discuss your home search and answer any questions you have. Looking forward to helping you!
warm_lead.seller: Perfect! {name}, thanks for all that info. {agent_name} will be in touch within 2 hours to discuss your home sale and provide a market analysis. Talk soon!

lukewarm_lead.buyer: Thank you {name}! I've got your information. {agent_name} will follow up via email within 24 hours with some resources and properties that might interest you. Feel free to reach out anytime with questions!
lukewarm_lead.seller: Thanks {name}! I've got all your details. {agent_name} will email you within 24 hours with market insights and information about selling your home. We're here when you're ready!

cold_lead.buyer: Thanks for your time {name}! I'll add you to our monthly newsletter with new listings and market updates. When you're ready to get more serious about buying, just let us know and we'll be here to help!
cold_lead.seller: Thank you {name}! I'll send you our monthly market reports so you can stay informed. When you're closer to selling, reach back out and we'll be happy to help!

clarifications.invalid_response: I didn't quite catch that. Could you clarify?
clarifications.missing_required: This information is important for me to help you best. Could you please answer?
clarifications.format_error: That doesn't look quite right. Could you try again? (Example: {example})

exit_options.user_exits: No problem at all! If you change your mind or have questions later, feel free to reach back out. Have a great day! üëã
exit_options.too_many_attempts: I'm having trouble understanding. Would you prefer to have {agent_name} call you directly instead? Or we can try again later!
exit_options.disqualified_gentle: Thanks for your interest {name}! Based on your current situation, I think you might be better served by [alternative resource]. Would you like me to point you in the right direction?

cold_lead_newsletter.subject: Welcome to {agent_name}'s Market Updates
cold_lead_newsletter.body:
Hi {name},

Thanks for your interest in {buyer_or_seller} real estate! I'm adding you to my monthly newsletter so you can stay informed about the market in {location}.

**You'll receive:**
- Monthly market reports and trends
- New listing alerts (buyers)
- Home selling tips (sellers)
- Local community news and events
- Seasonal home maintenance tips

**In This Month's Edition:**
- [Current market headline]
- [Featured listings or sales]
- [Helpful tip or article]

Feel free to reach out anytime if you have questions or want to discuss your real estate goals. I'm always happy to help!

Warm regards,
{agent_name}
{agent_title}
{agent_phone}
{agent_email}

P.S. - You can update your preferences or unsubscribe at any time using the links at the bottom of this email.

hot_lead_immediate.buyer: Hi {name}! This is {agent_first_name} from {brokerage}. Just got your home buying inquiry - you sound like a great buyer! Calling you in 5 min to discuss properties in {location}. üè°
hot_lead_immediate.seller: Hi {name}! {agent_first_name} here from {brokerage}. Got your home selling inquiry - excited to help! Calling in 5 min to discuss your home at {short_address}. üìû

warm_lead_followup.buyer: Hi {name}, {agent_first_name} from {brokerage}. Thanks for your interest in buying a home! I'll call you within 2 hours to discuss your search. Feel free to text back anytime! üè°
warm_lead_followup.seller: Hi {name}, {agent_first_name} from {brokerage}. Thanks for inquiring about selling! I'll reach out within 2 hours to discuss your home sale. Text me anytime with questions! üì±

appointment_confirmation.default: Hi {name}! Confirming our appointment for {date} at {time}. {location_or_phone}. Reply YES to confirm or let me know if you need to reschedule! - {agent_first_name}

check_in.buyer: Hi {name}! {agent_first_name} here. Just checking in on your home search. Any questions or ready to see some properties? Text back anytime! üè°
check_in.seller: Hi {name}! {agent_first_name} checking in. Any updates on your timeline for selling? Happy to discuss anytime - just text or call! üìû
